import React, { useState } from 'react'; const App = () => { const data = [ { id: 1, title: 'KhasanBoy' }, { id: 2, title: 'Ali' }, { id: 3, title: 'Sardor' }, { id: 4, title: 'Umarjon' }, { id: 5, title: 'Ruqiya' }, ] const [category, setCategory] = useState('id'); const [inputValue, setInputValue] = useState('') return (
{data.map((value, id) => value['title'].toString().toLocaleLowerCase().includes(inputValue.toLocaleLowerCase()) && ( ))}
setInputValue(e.target.value)} />
{value.id} {value.title}
) } export default App;
